data.text:
#Nepal is the 10th most affected country in the world in terms of climate change. Join us at #COP28UAE to explore opportunities for strengthening climate financing and positioning gender equality and social inclusion at the centre of climate action. üóì 4 December | 11:30 AM ‚Äì 1:15 PM (Dubai) üìç Mobility Zone, Building 31, Nepal Pavilion, COP28 You may also join us online ‚û° https://ow.ly/B7Su50QeRP3

#COP29 Thematic Agenda is out! The UN Climate Change Conference will take place on 11-22 November in Baku, Azerbaijan. Every year the host country organise a thematic agenda with days dedicated to key issues such as energy, finance, cities, education or gender equality. This agenda helps COP participants organise their discussions around common themes to unite efforts and streamline their events. üîó Read the full article: https://lnkd.in/e6gSgzXf What do you think about this year‚Äôs agenda? COP29 Azerbaijan ONU Climat #ClimateAction #Sustainability

In the lead up to the COP28 Climate Change negotiations taking place in Dubai from Nov. 30-Dec. 12, UN Women is releasing a set of critical publications on the linkages between gender equality issues / climate change / biodiversity loss/ environmental degradation. It was fantastic working with the talented UN Women Economic Empowerment section team to contribute as a reviewer to the development of this policy brief on "A GENDER-RESPONSIVE JUST TRANSITION FOR PEOPLE AND PLANET." Click below to read the full brief and also to access the other gender/climate nexus policy papers which have been and will soon be posted by UN Women. https://lnkd.in/geByjHKd #climateaction #biodiversitycrisis #genderequality
